cards.name: Arya Stark
cards.text: While Arya Stark is standing, characters cannot be saved.
cards.flavor: "I don’t wear gowns. You can't fight in a stupid gown."

cards.name: I Am No One
cards.text: Action: Choose a character you control with printed cost 3 or lower. Until the end of the phase, that character loses all faction affiliations and Traits, gains insight and stealth, and does not kneel when declared as an attacker.

cards.name: Highgarden Refugee
cards.text: While there is a Summer plot card revealed, reduce the cost to marshal Highgarden Refugee by 1.

cards.name: Arbor Queen
cards.text: Action: Kneel Arbor Queen to choose a [tyrell] character and a non-[tyrell] character. Until the end of the phase, each of those characters gets +2 STR.
cards.flavor: Five times as large as Blackbird and magnificent to behold, she had three great burgundy sails and banks of oars that flashed gold and white in the sunlight.

cards.name: Coldhands
cards.text: Coldhands cannot be saved. Reaction: After you marshal Coldhands, choose 1 other non-Army character controlled by each player. Remove each of those characters from the game until Coldhands leaves play.
cards.designer: Card design by 2011 Joust World Champion, Brett Zeiler.

cards.name: The Bay of Seals
cards.text: Action: Kneel The Bay of Seals to choose and stand a character owned by an opponent.
cards.flavor: Its waters were grey and green and choppy, and the wooded shore they followed was a snarl of rocks and whirlpools.

cards.name: King's Men
cards.text: Reaction: After a phase begins, choose a kneeling character. Until the end of the phase, treat that character as if its printed text box were blank (except for Traits). (Limit once per round.)

cards.name: Sacrificed to the Red God
cards.text: Play only if you control a R'hllor character. Marshaling Action: Sacrifice a character to search your deck for a R'hllor character with equal or lower printed cost and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Cersei's Informer
cards.text: Bestow (3). Action: Move 1 gold from Cersei's Informer to a non-Spy card you control to draw 1 card. Then, choose and discard 1 card from your hand. (Limit once per round.)

cards.name: Ser Pounce
cards.text:
Unique character with printed cost 3 or lower only. Ambush (1).
Attached character gains an [intrigue] icon and does not kneel when declared as an attacker in an [intrigue] challenge.

cards.name: Tarle the Thrice-Drowned
cards.text: You may marshal non-unique Drowned God characters from your dead pile as if they were in your hand.
cards.flavor: ...who had once been thought so holy that he was picked to crown a king.

cards.name: Given to the Drowned God
cards.text: Action: Kill a Drowned God character to draw X cards. X is that character's printed cost.
cards.flavor: "He must be given to the god. The old way." <cite>Aeron Damphair</cite>

cards.name: Daenerys Targaryen
cards.text: Daenerys Targaryen's STR cannot be reduced by card effects. Reaction: After you play a [targaryen] event, choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets -1 STR and is killed if its STR is 0. (Limit 3 times per round.)

cards.name: Mhysa
cards.text: Lady character only. During the first [power] challenge you initiate each round, attached character does not kneel when declared as an attacker and gets +1 STR for each attacking character.

cards.name: House Yronwood Knight
cards.text: Reaction: After you lose a challenge in which House Yronwood Knight is participating, discard 1 card at random from the winning opponent's hand.
cards.flavor: The Yronwoods might declare for Quentyn, but alone they were no threat.

cards.name: Secret Pact
cards.text:
Non-[martell] character only. Ambush (3).
Attached character gains renown.
Attached character cannot be declared as an attacker in challenges against you.

cards.name: The High Sparrow
cards.text:
Each player cannot gain more than 7 gold each round.
Each player cannot draw more than 3 cards each round.
cards.flavor: "The Faith Militant reborn...that would be the answer to three hundred years of prayer, Your Grace."

cards.name: "The Song of the Seven"
cards.text: Reaction: After you lose dominance, move 2 power from the winning opponent's faction card to a The Seven character you control. (Max 1 per phase.)
cards.flavor: The Seven Gods who made us all, are listening if we should call. So close your eyes, you shall not fall, they see you, little children.

cards.name: The Faith Militant
cards.text: Non-The Seven characters and locations you control cannot gain power. Reaction: After you win a challenge, kneel your faction card to move 1 power from the losing opponent's faction card to a participating The Seven character you control.

cards.name: Compelled by the Faith
cards.text: When Revealed: Move each power from each card in play to its controller's faction card.
